profile.title: Iprofayile yomsebenzisi
profile.noPrivateKey: Akukho sitshixo sabucala kwisixhobo esi sokuthumela ngaphandle.
profile.importFailed: Kusilele ukufaka isitshixo (iphasiwedi engachanekanga okanye ifayile yonakele).
profile.keysRotated: Ipari yesitshixo entsha ivelisiwe kwaye isitshixo sikawonke-wonke silayishiwe.
profile.keyDisclaimer: Isitshixo sakho sabucala asisoze siphume kulesi sixhobo. Thumela ukhuphelo olukhuselweyo ngephasiwedi ukuze usilungise kwenye isixhobo.
profile.themeFreeNotice: Ukwi-Free—sebenzisa ii-Sun/Moon ezikhawulezayo ngezantsi. Nyusela ukuze uvule imixholo engakumbi.
profile.backupDesc: Yenza ii-backup ezikhuselweyo ngephasiwedi zezitshixo zakho, uze uzibuyisele kwesinye isixhobo ukuze ulinganise.
profile.followHint: Ibali labo liya kuvela kwi-feed ethi Ulandelayo xa bethumele kubaphulaphuli abaBalandele (okanye KuWonke-wonke).
profile.sectionCrashedBody: Kukho into engahambanga kakuhle kweli candelo.
profile.callTextForwardingDescription: Dlulisela iifowuni kunye ne-SMS ezingenayo kwifowuni yakho okanye i-imeyile eqinisekisiweyo. Ezisuka kuwe zingabonisa inombolo yakho yeChatforia.
profile.errSmsDest: Khetha ubuncinane indawo enye (ifowuni okanye i-imeyile).
profile.errQuietHours: IiYure zoxolo kufuneka zibe phakathi kwe-0 ne-23.

chat.selectPrompt: Khetha umbhalo okanye igumbi lencoko ukuze uqale ukuncokola

status.filesNote: Kufikelela kwiifayile ezi-5. Iphela kwiiyure ezingama-24 ngokungagqibekanga.

auth.headline: Umyalezo okhuselekileyo, wehlabathi onotoliko olukhawulezayo
auth.description: Ukutshixeka ekupheleni ukuya ekupheleni, uguqulelo oluququzelelwa yi-AI, imiyalezo enyamalalayo, kunye neefowuni/ividiyo.

feature.privacy: Imfihlo kuqala. Idatha yakho, ulawulo lwakho.

auth.desktopTip: Usekhompyutheni? Skena ngefowuni yakho ukuze ufumane i-app.
auth.tip: Ungasebenzisa iChatforia naso nasiphi na isixhobo — okanye ukhuphele i-app ukuze ufumane amava angcono.
auth.scanHint: Skena ukuze ukhuphele i-app okanye uvule kwisikhangeli sakho.

press.title: Abasemagqabini
press.boilerplateText: I-Chatforia yingxoxo ekhuselekileyo enotoliko olukhawulezayo kunye ne-E2E encryption, eyilwe ukuze incoko zehlabathi zibe zabucala kwaye zibe lula.

careers.title: Imisebenzi
careers.intro: Siliqela elincinci elakha umyalezo wabucala, wehlabathi. Ukuba ukhathalela ukutshixeka, ufikeleleko, kunye ne-UX entle, singathanda ukuva ngawe.
careers.openRoles: Iindima ezivulekileyo: Ubunjineli (Full-stack, iOS, Android), Imveliso, Inkxaso.

about.title: Malunga neChatforia
about.description: IChatforia yinkonzo yomyalezo ekhuselekileyo, enolwimi oluninzi enotshixeko ekupheleni ukuya ekupheleni, utoliko olukhawulezayo, kunye neefowuni/ividiyo. Injongo yethu ilula: ukunceda abantu badibane—ngokhuseleko, ngobumfihlo, nangaphesheya kweelwimi.

values.access: Ufikelelo kubo bonke: Guqulela iilwimi ezingaphezu kwe-100 ngokuzenzekela.

about.howDescription: Imiyalezo itshixwa kwisixhobo sakho phambi kokuba iphume. Utoliko, ii-backup, kunye nolinganiso lwezixhobo zenzelwe ukunciphisa into esinokuyibona kwiiseva zethu.

advertise.title: Thengisa neChatforia
advertise.description: Fikelela kubasebenzisi bomyalezo abanomdla ngendawo ezihloniphayo, ezikhuselekileyo kubaphulaphuli. Sinikezela ngethuba leebhena kwiindawo ezibonakalayo, izixhasi, kunye neepromo zendlu. Ababhalisi bePremium abababoni iintengiso.

adsense.withPubId: Okwangoku sikhupha iintengiso nge Google AdSense. Ukuba ungathanda ukujolisa kuthi ngeGoogle Ads, sebenzisa i-ID yomshicileli {{pubId}} uze ucele managed placement kwiiyunithi zethu ngezantsi. Izixhasi ezithe ngqo ziyafumaneka—sebenzisa ifom.
adsense.noPubId: Okwangoku sikhupha iintengiso nge Google AdSense. Izixhasi ezithe ngqo ziyafumaneka—sebenzisa ifom engezantsi.

advertise.noPlacements: Akukho zindawo zicwangciswe okwangoku. Zongeza kwi ads/placements.js.

why.highSession: Ukungena rhoqo kunye nexesha elide lokuzimisa kwi-UI yencoko
why.brandSafe: Iifomathi ezikhuselekileyo brand; ukunciphisa ubuninzi obuhloniphekileyo
why.deals: Izivumelwano ezithe ngqo okanye nge-AdSense/Google Ads

form.submittedMsg: Enkosi! Umbuzo wakho uthunyelweyo. Siza kulandela kungekudala.
form.missingRequired: Nceda ugcwalise igama, i-imeyile, kunye nomyalezo.
form.mailtoInfo: Sivula isixhobo se-imeyile yakho ukuze uthumele umbuzo…

upgrade.title: Nyusela
upgrade.subtitle: Vula isicwangciso esikufaneleyo: susa iintengiso ngePlus, okanye ufumane iimpawu zamandla ezipheleleyo ngePremium.

gettingStarted.title: Ukuqala
gettingStarted.subtitle: Umtsha kwiChatforia? Esi sikhokelo sikhawulezayo sibonisa ezona zinto ukuze uqale ngokukhawuleza.

alert.text: Esi sikhokelo siya kukhula njengoko sisungula iimpawu ezintsha. Ukuba kukho into elahlekileyo, sazise nge

section2.title: 2) Qalisa ukuncokola
section2.item1: Yenza i-DM okanye Iqela uze uthumele umyalezo wakho wokuqala.
section2.item2: Sebenzisa utoliko lwangoko ukuncokola ngeelwimi ezingaphezu kwe-100.
section2.item3: Zama imiyalezo enyamalalayo kunye nezikhangeli zokufunda kwiProfayile → Imfihlo.

section3.title: 3) Yiya phambili
section3.item1Part2: iphepha (Plus = akukho ntengiso, Premium = iimpawu ezipheleleyo).
section3.item2Part1: Nxibelelanisa izixhobo ezongezelelekileyo uze umisele ii-backup ezitshixiweyo kwi

account.q: Ndiyenza okanye ndibuyisa njani iakhawunti yam?
account.a: Khuphela i-app okanye sebenzisa iwebhu, cofa “Dala iakhawunti”, uqinisekise i-imeyile/ifowuni. Ukubuyisa, sebenzisa “Ulibele iphasiwedi”.

privacy.q: Ingaba imiyalezo itshixiwe ekupheleni ukuya ekupheleni?
privacy.a: Ewe. Imiyalezo kunye neefowuni zitshixiwe ekupheleni ukuya ekupheleni ngokungagqibekanga. Nguwe kuphela nomamkeli onokuyifunda.

translate.a: Vula “Guqulela ngokuzenzekela” kuSeto → Inkangeleko & Ulwimi. Siguqulela kwisixhobo xa kuxhaswa, kungenjalo sisebenzisa ii-API ezikhuselekileyo ngedatha encinci.

contact.a: Sifikelele ku support@chatforia.com. Faka i-screenshot kunye nenguqulelo ye-app yakho.

contact.title: Qhagamshelana nathi
contact.errorSend: Akukwazekanga ukuthumela. Nceda uthumele i-imeyile ku support@chatforia.com.

intro.body: Lo Mgaqo-nkqubo wabumfihlo uchaza indlela iChatforia (“thina”) eqokelela, esebenzisa, kwaye isabelana ngayo ngolwazi xa usebenzisa ii-apps kunye neenkonzo zethu. Siyila iChatforia ukuze sinciphise idatha esinokuyifikelela.

infoWeCollect.title: Ulwazi esiluqokelelanga
infoWeCollect.account: Ulwazi lweakhawunti (umz., i-imeyile/ifowuni) ukuze senze kwaye sikhusele iakhawunti yakho.
infoWeCollect.encrypted: Umxholo otshixiweyo (imiyalezo/iifowuni) utshixiwe ekupheleni ukuya ekupheleni; asikwazi ukuwufunda.
infoWeCollect.diagnostics: I-diagnostics/ukusetyenziswa njengemilayezo yokuwa, uhlobo lwesixhobo, okanye uhlalutyo oluncinci ukulungisa ukusebenza.

sharing.title: Ukwabelana
sharing.body: Asithengisi idatha yabucala. Sinokwabelana ngedatha encinci nabaqhubi (umz., izaziso zokusunduza, uhlalutyo) phantsi kwezikontrakthi eziqinileyo.

rights.title: Amalungelo akho
rights.body: Kuxhomekeke kummandla wakho (umz., GDPR/UK GDPR/CPRA), unokucela ukufikelela, ukulungisa, ukucima, okanye ukuphuma kolunye uqhubekeko. Qhagamshelana: privacy@chatforia.com.

retention.title: Ukugcinwa kwedatha & ukhuseleko
retention.body: Sigcina kuphela oko kufunekayo ukuze kuqhube inkonzo kwaye sisebenzisa ukhuseleko oluqhelekileyo kushishino. Umxholo we-E2E asinakuwuvula.

children.title: Abantwana
children.body: IChatforia ayijoliswanga kubantwana abangaphantsi kwe-13 (okanye njengoko kufunwa ngumthetho wenu wengingqi).

changes.title: Iinguqu
changes.body: Siza kupapasha uhlaziyo apha size sihlaziye umhla othi “Ihlaziywe okokugqibela”.

intro.body: Ngokusebenzisa iChatforia uyavuma le Migaqo. Ukuba awuvumelani, nceda ungasisebenzisi.

accounts.title: Ii-akhawunti
accounts.itemAccurateInfo: Nika ulwazi oluchanekileyo uze ugcine iziqinisekiso zokungena zikhuselekile.

acceptableUse.title: Usetyenziso olamkelweyo
acceptableUse.itemNoAbuse: Akukho mxholo ongekho mthethweni, onobundlobongela, okanye ophula amalungelo; akukho spam okanye abuselo oluzenzekelayo.

yourContent.title: Umxholo wakho
yourContent.body: Ugcina amalungelo kumxholo wakho. Ubusinika amalungelo afunekayo ukuze siqhube inkonzo (umz., ukusa, ukugcina, utoliko).

disclaimer.title: Izilumkiso & uxanduva
disclaimer.body: Inkonzo inikezelwa “njengoko injalo” ngaphandle kweziqinisekiso. Kangangokunokwenzeka ngumthetho, iChatforia ayixanduva ngomonakalo ongathanga ngqo okanye olandelayo.

changes.title: Iinguqu
changes.body: Singahlaziya le migaqo; ukuqhubeka nokusebenzisa emva kohlaziyo kuthetha uvumile.

doNotSell.title: Musa Ukuthengisa okanye Ukwabelana Ngolwazi Lwam Lobuqu
doNotSell.body: IChatforia ayithengisi ulwazi lobuqu. Abemi baseCalifornia basenokungenisa izicelo phantsi kwe-CPRA besebenzisa iqhosha elingezantsi.

cookies.title: Iisetingi zeKuki
cookies.body: IChatforia isebenzisa iikuki ezimbalwa (umz., iseshoni, ukhuseleko). Asisebenzisi iikuki zentengiso zomntu wesithathu. Lawula iikuki kuseto lwesikhangeli sakho.

phoneNumberManager.noNumberAssigned: Akukho nambolo yabelweyo. Khetha ngekhowudi yommandla ukuze uqale ukuthumela imiyalezo.

startChatModal.title: Qalisa incoko
startChatModal.nameUsernamePhoneEmail: Chwetheza igama, igama lomsebenzisi, ifowuni, okanye i-imeyile…
startChatModal.searchPrompt: Chwetheza igama lomsebenzisi okanye ifowuni uze ucofe uKhangela.
startChatModal.saveContactsHint: Iifowuni/i-imeyile ziya kufumaneka emva kokuba uzigcinile njengonxibelelwano.

sounds.freeNotice: Ukwi-Free — izandi ze-premium ziboniswa kodwa zitshixiwe. Nyusela ukuze uvule zonke.

aiSettings.title: Iisetingi ze-AI
aiSettings.controlIntro: Lawula utoliko, iimpendulo ezikrelekrele, kunye neefowuni zokuziphendulela ze-ForiaBot.
aiSettings.smartRepliesHint: Thumela imiyalezo emalunga nemibini yokugqibela (ehlelwe) kwi-AI ukuze icebise iimpendulo ezikhawulezayo.
aiSettings.maskProfanityHint: Xa ivuliwe, iingcebiso ezibuyiselwa yi-AI ziya kuba namazwi abekiweyo efihliwe

accessibilitySettings.title: Ufikeleleko & Izilumkiso
accessibilitySettings.accessibilityDesc: Iinketho zokwenza iChatforia ibe lula ngaphandle kokuxhomekeka kwisandi.
accessibilitySettings.interfaceFontSizeHelp: Iqala kubungakanani obuqhelekileyo. Nyusa ukuba ukhetha umbhalo omkhulu kuSeto loFikeleleko.
accessibilitySettings.notificationsDesc:
Izilumkiso ezibonakalayo zemiyalezo & iifowuni
Bonisa iibhanana kunye nokukhanya kwesihloko ukuze ungaphoswa ngumsebenzi.
accessibilitySettings.vibrateOnNew:
Nyikima xa kukho imiyalezo emitsha (xa ixhaswa)
Vusa isixhobo ngezaziso.
accessibilitySettings.flashOnCall:
Khanyisa isikrini xa kukho umnxeba ongenayo
Ukukhanya okufutshane xa ifowuni ibetha.
accessibilitySettings.autoTranscribeVoiceNotes:
Guqulela amanqaku elizwi ngokuzenzekela
Ncamathisela isishwankathelo kwiimiyalezo zesandi ozifumanayo.
accessibilitySettings.visualAlertsDesc: Bonisa iibhanana kunye nokukhanya kwesihloko ukuze ungaphoswa ngumsebenzi.

privacySection.ciphertextOnlyNote: Gcina kuphela i-ciphertext kwiseva. Kukhubaza i-AI/Guqulela kunye nokujonga kokulawula.

peoplePage.searchPlaceholder: Khangela nge-alias, igama, igama lomsebenzisi, okanye ifowuni
peoplePage.inviteDesc: Yabelana ngekhonkco lokumema ukuze niqale incoko kwangoko.
peoplePage.getTheAppDesc: Hlala unxibelelene uhamba ngeChatforia ye-iOS ne-Android.
peoplePage.syncTip: Icebiso: Imiyalezo yakho ihlala ilinganisiwe phakathi kwewebhu kunye neselfowuni.

randomChat.title: Incoko Engahleliyo
randomChat.description: Dibana nomntu omtsha kwangoko. Siza kukuthelekisa sivule igumbi lencoko lexeshana.
